typical_assumptions: One story is specified at a time
Acceptance criteria must be testable, unambiguous, and executable
Gherkin syntax or structured language (Given/When/Then) is preferred
Scenarios are written in plain English without variables or test data
Specification drives both design and test — not written after implementation
Scenarios must cover both behavior and domain policy
Examples tables when used must include ALL variables used in scenario steps
Examples tables when used must have exact values for both input AND output variables
Every variable when usedin scenario steps must have a corresponding column in Examples table
Examples tables when usedmust have actual test data, not placeholders
Output/expected result variables must be included in Examples tables when used
Examples drive both design and test — not written after implementation
